items.sentence: Are you and Tom still planning on doing that?
Since Tom is sick, I'm sure he won't do that.
It's a pity that Tom didn't agree to do that.
It'd be safer to do that the way Tom does it.
It would be surprising if Tom didn't do that.
It seems that Tom doesn't do that very often.
I'm pretty sure Tom wants to do that with us.
Just a moment. I haven't made up my mind yet.
Gargling with salt water helps stop coughing.
Since it began raining, I ran into the house.
